video.title: C.I.D
video.synopsis: A team of dedicated men and women in the Crime Investigation Department will risk everything to solve Mumbai's toughest, most complicated crimes.

episodes.synopsis: Identical incidents of wives attacking their husbands with intent to kill shock the CID as they try to solve the case of a masquerading murderer.
episodes.title: Behrupiya Khooni

episodes.synopsis: The team follows the twisted trail of a serial killer who murders female celebrities and then fashions them into wax idols.
episodes.title: Wax Ka Putla

episodes.synopsis: The team takes on a strange case where all the passengers traveling aboard a bus are found dead. Was it a terrorist strike or a not-so-simple murder?
episodes.title: Maut Ka Safar

episodes.synopsis: A woman approaches the CID and confesses to murdering her husband, but when the team visits her home, there is no corpse and no sign of a crime.
episodes.title: Main Hoon Katil

episodes.synopsis: The team probes into the case of a woman who opens her safe to find her valuables missing and the body of her husband's secretary locked inside.
episodes.title: Shaatir Chor

episodes.synopsis: When a serial killer is shot dead on his way to court, the team investigates and learns the criminal was linked to a gang of drug dealers.
episodes.title: Khooni Ka Khoon

episodes.synopsis: When a girl is reported missing and 5 million rupees are stolen from her office, the team prepares for a case of theft, murder or something else.
episodes.title: Talaash

episodes.synopsis: When one of the team's officers goes missing, the investigation leads to a man on a special mission who seeks the CID's help.
episodes.title: CID aur Commando

episodes.synopsis: When a girl is found unconscious with a message written on her wrist, the team uncovers other cases and tries to follow the missive to the culprits.
episodes.title: Jungle Ki Ladki Ka Raaz

episodes.synopsis: When a couple finds a girl's dead body in a park, the CID discovers that the victim was shot at point blank range -- but her body tells another story.
episodes.title: Raaz Na Sadne Wali Laash Ka

episodes.synopsis: When scientists search for a rare plant in the jungle, they find an unidentifiable body covered with flies instead. The CID must solve the mystery.
episodes.title: Keedey Ka Rahasya

episodes.synopsis: Terror strikes Neha when she sees a spirit in her house, which leads her to look into the story of a college student who allegedly committed suicide.
episodes.title: Khooni Daayan

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of a corpse shocks and puzzles CID sleuths when they learn that the deceased was a bank robber who was hanged three years earlier.
episodes.title: Murder of a Dead Man

episodes.synopsis: When Kunal's dead body falls from above and lands on a car, helicopter noise on the CCTV footage leads the team to investigate who pushed Kunal.
episodes.title: Aasman Se Giri Laash

episodes.synopsis: Daya and Abhijeet follow the trail of a man who calls himself Dragon and operates a secret terrorist cell. For Daya, the battle is personal.
episodes.title: Bureau mein khoon

episodes.synopsis: As Pradyuman leaves a party, he is shot at by a masked killer. When he tries to fight back with a coffee mug, he discovers his attacker is a woman.
episodes.title: ACP Murder

episodes.synopsis: When three murders take place in a room and three suspects claim their innocence, the team must expose a fake art exhibition to see the real picture.
episodes.title: Teen Mujrim

episodes.synopsis: When a couple at a movie theater reports finding a bag they suspect might contain a bomb, the CID discovers the bag actually holds a human hand.
episodes.title: Ek Aadmi Teen Haath

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a recently married man and learns that two people were keeping track of the newlywed couple.
episodes.title: Murder in Matheran

episodes.synopsis: The assistant police commissioner gets a shock when he encounters a man he shot dead years ago, leading the CID to uncover a terrorist plot.
episodes.title: ACP In Danger

episodes.synopsis: A group of friends enters a colony to have fun but they find a dead body. The CID must decide if the colony is haunted, or if there was foul play.
episodes.title: Bhootiya Colony

episodes.synopsis: As an actor and actress hold a press conference, the actress reacts in terror at the sight of a mystery murderer the CDI cannot identify on CCTV.
episodes.title: Sonakshi in Danger

episodes.synopsis: A singer and three others are found dead, and the common thread connecting the victims is an event commemorating the launch of a new video game.
episodes.title: Raaz Video Game Ka

episodes.synopsis: When a film crew finds a dead body in the jungle, the forensic lab tests reveal there were drugs inside the victim's stomach.
episodes.title: Rakhi Ka Bandhan

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is hit by a truck, her child goes missing. The CID team finds and cares for the child as they try to figure out who wants to kill him.
episodes.title: Baby in Danger

episodes.synopsis: A strange man buys a plot of land and the workers there soon start acting odd and violent. The CID must find the reason and the man behind it.
episodes.title: Jungli Maanav
